subject: insulted by the spirits
author: neli_nelis
full_text:
Hello,

I don't know what to do, is the second time that a spirit gets in my 
cell, just to insult me, then "she" gets away, then others come to 
bring wonderful messages, are some spirits envious of us ? I think its 
the same spirit that have insulted me, its a woman, don't know who she 
was or is, but she had handled to get in to insult me. Do I have to 
tell her to go away and leave me alone ? or do I have to insult her 
back ?

any ideas ?

Thanks
Neli
